title: Launch button Won't start the game.
body: The launch button goes grey when i click and it comes back to orange button after few second and does not start the game ;c

replies.body: Have you updated to the new client?  If clicking launch won't load the launcher then there may be either a corrupted patching or permissions issue.  As a first step, I suggest using the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to make sure the client has permissions to load up.  If the issue is not resolved after going over each step, let me know along with which version of the client you're using.  Let me know!
